events.name: clear
events.description: When using the 'clearable' property, this event is emitted when the already selected button is clicked
events.description_zh: 使用“clearable”属性时，单击已选择的按钮时会发出此事件

model-value.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

options.description: Array of Objects defining each option
options.description_zh: 定义每个选项的对象数组

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: The color used to color the separator, which can be any color from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

toggle-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
toggle-color.desc: The color used to color the separator, which can be any color from the Quasar Color Palette
toggle-color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

spread.description: Spread horizontally to all available space
spread.description_zh: 水平扩散到所有可用空间

rounded.description: Applies a more prominent border-radius for a squared shape button
rounded.description_zh: 为方形按钮应用更突出的边框半径

size.description: Button size name or a CSS unit including unit name
size.description_zh: 按钮大小名称或包含单元名称的 CSS 单元

padding.description: Apply custom padding (vertical [horizontal]); Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl); Also removes the min width and height when set
padding.description_zh: 应用自定义填充（垂直 [水平]）;以 CSS 为单位的大小，包括单位名称或标准大小名称 （none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl）;设置时还会删除最小宽度和高度

no-caps.description: Avoid turning label text into caps (which happens by default)
no-caps.description_zh: 避免将标签文本转换为大写字母（默认情况下会发生这种情况）

stack.description: Stack icon and label vertically instead of on same line (like it is by default)
stack.description_zh: 垂直堆叠图标和标签，而不是在同一行上（就像默认一样）

stretch.description: When used on flexbox parent, button will stretch to parent's height
stretch.description_zh: 在 flexbox 父项上使用时，按钮将拉伸到父项的高度

clearable.description: Clears model on click of the already selected button
clearable.description_zh: 单击已选择的按钮时清除模型
